attributes.action: Block Barack Hussein Obama from UK entry
attributes.additional_details: The UK has banned entry to many individuals for hate speech. The same principles should apply to everyone who wishes to enter the UK. The most dangerous hate speech is that which is spoken insidiously and results in policies that openly foment and result in genocide.
attributes.background: The signatories believe Barack Hussein Obama should be banned from UK entry. He has refused to give priority to Yazidi and Assyrian Christians fleeing ISIS to enter the United States. Declassified documents obtained through a federal lawsuit suggest that the CIA gave support to ISIS.
